reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: property is a bit dated, our room was located on the opposite side to check in (hotel is divided on two sides of the street) and i'm guessing our side of the road housed the older rooms. little bit of a post communist feel to the room, not quite the radisson-trying-to-be-modern experience ive become accustomed to. excellent location, right in the middle of town. good irish bar on ground floor which serves a reasonable jug of guiness. no air-con - and although i'm told ordinarily this isn't a problem in finland, aug 2006 was a very hot month and air con would have been nice. breakfast very typical + plentiful.
reviews.title: pictures on site a little misleading
